name: @invertase/react-native-apple-authentication
author: Invertase <oss@invertase.io> (http://invertase.io)
description: A complete Apple Authentication services API for React Native iOS apps.

scripts.build:all: npm run build:clean && npm run build && npm run build:example:android && npm run build:example:ios
scripts.build:example:ios: cd example && (xcodebuild -workspace ios/testing.xcworkspace -scheme testing -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -UseModernBuildSystem=YES || true)
scripts.precommit: npm run prepare && npm run build:all
scripts.prepare: npm run tsc:compile && npm run prepare:example
scripts.prepare:example: cd example && npm && cd ios && (pod install || true)
